sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' function CategoryDetail({ match }) { const [category, setCategory] = useState({}) const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]) const id = match.params.id const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { axios({ method: "GET", url: `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/category/${id}/` }).then(response => { setCategory(response.data) setPosts(response.data.posts) }) }, [id]) return (

{category.name}

{posts.map(p=>(
{p.title}

{p.content}

setModalShow(false)} /> Read more
))}

About

Customize this section to tell your visitors a little bit about your publication, writers, content, or something else entirely. Totally up to you.

 ) } function MydModalWithGrid(props) { return ( Using Grid in Modal .col-xs-12 .col-md-8 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 ); } export default CategoryDetail;
